title: Font used for Gulfstream logo
content:
Does anyone know what the gulfstream logo font is?

[http://www.gulfstream.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150409035620/http:/www.gulfstream.com/ "http://www.gulfstream.com/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150409035620im_/http:/typophile.com/files/gulfstream_6640.jpg)
author: ahoward

comments.content:
What The Font claims it is DeVinne Text. Looks pretty close to me if you extend the width of the G a bit.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/de-vinne/devinne-text/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150409035620/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/de-vinne/devinne-text/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/de-vinne/devinne-text/")

Others in the same vein:

Scotch Modern, from several foundries, including a new version from ShinnType  
 [http://shinntype.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150409035620/http:/shinntype.com/ "http://shinntype.com/")

FB Moderno  
 [http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/ModernoFB/styles](http://web.archive.org/web/20150409035620/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/ModernoFB/styles "http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/ModernoFB/styles")
